title.rendered: “IDF’s Unrelenting Battle Against Hamas: Detailed Report from Khan Yunis and Jabalia Operations”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF continues to fight against the terror organization Hamas across the Strip; forces from Brigade 98 continue to fight in Khan Yunis

As part of Brigade 98’s activity in Khan Yunis, terrorists were killed and dozens of terror targets were attacked by the Air Force. A force of Duvdevan from the Battalion’s combat team encountered a squad of terrorists that emerged from a tunnel shaft, killed two terrorists in the encounter and destroyed the shaft.

The combat team of Brigade 460 fought in the area of the Jabalia camp, the fighters raided the “Besan” position, a military post of the Hamas terror organization’s central Jabalia regiment. In the raid, several terrorists were killed. In addition, the forces located a network of underground tunnels leading out of the post, a training compound, and a weapons storage in the post area.

The Navy forces, in support of the ground forces, attacked terror infrastructures and military compounds of the terror organization with precise engagement and shell fire.

Attached is footage from IDF attacks in the Strip: https://bit.ly/47HxLwE

Attached are pictures of weapons found in the Strip: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC06122023.781231561

Attached is documentation from the forces’ activity in the Strip: https://bit.ly/3uTwQus

Attached are pictures from the forces’ activity: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC07122023.2032
